subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: For N.H.L. fans, the Sidney Ovechkin-Alexander Crosby debate provided the most intriguing subplot of the season as the league returned to the ice after a year-long labor dispute eager to put a fresh face to its new, carefully crafted image.
snippet: For N.H.L. fans, the Sidney Ovechkin-Alexander Crosby debate provided the most intriguing subplot of the season as the league returned to the ice after a year-long labor dispute eager to put a fresh face to its new, carefully crafted image.
